mapper.insert: insert into myBoard (bno, title, content, writer) values (MYBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title},#{content},#{writer})
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regDate, viewCnt from myBoard where bno = #{bno}
select bno, title, content, writer, REGDATE from myBoard order by bno desc

select bno, title, content, writer, regDate, viewCnt from ( select bno, title, content, writer, regDate, viewCnt, row_number() over(order by bno desc) as rNum from myBoard ) where rNum between #{rowStart} and #{rowEnd} order by bno desc
select count(bno) from myBoard where bno >0
